price: কেতিয়াও নহয়, নিশ্চয় পাপীসকলৰ আমলনামা ছিজ্জিনত আছে।
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلۡفُجَّارِ لَفِي سِجِّينٖ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: kallā inna kitāba al-fujāri lafī sijjīnin
